A Psalm<S>4210</S> of David<S>1732</S>. The earth<S>776</S> is the LORD'S<S>3068</S>, and the fulness<S>4393</S> thereof; the world<S>8398</S>, and they that dwell<S>3427</S> therein.
For he hath founded<S>3245</S> it upon the seas<S>3220</S>, and established<S>3559</S> it upon the floods<S>5104</S>.
Who shall ascend<S>5927</S> into the hill<S>2022</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>? or who shall stand<S>6965</S> in his holy<S>6944</S> place<S>4725</S>?
He that hath clean<S>5355</S> hands<S>3709</S>, and a pure<S>1249</S> heart<S>3824</S>; who hath not lifted up<S>5375</S> his soul<S>5315</S> unto vanity<S>7723</S>, nor sworn<S>7650</S> deceitfully<S>4820</S>. <sup>He: Heb. The clean of hands</sup>
He shall receive<S>5375</S> the blessing<S>1293</S> from the LORD<S>3068</S>, and righteousness<S>6666</S> from the God<S>430</S> of his salvation<S>3468</S>.
This is the generation<S>1755</S> of them that seek<S>1875</S> him, that seek<S>1245</S> thy face<S>6440</S>, O Jacob<S>3290</S>. Selah<S>5542</S>. <sup>O Jacob: or, O God of Jacob</sup>
Lift up<S>5375</S> your heads<S>7218</S>, O ye gates<S>8179</S>; and be ye lift up<S>5375</S>, ye everlasting<S>5769</S> doors<S>6607</S>; and the King<S>4428</S> of glory<S>3519</S> shall come in<S>935</S>.
Who is this King<S>4428</S> of glory<S>3519</S>? The LORD<S>3068</S> strong<S>5808</S> and mighty<S>1368</S>, the LORD<S>3068</S> mighty<S>1368</S> in battle<S>4421</S>.
Lift up<S>5375</S> your heads<S>7218</S>, O ye gates<S>8179</S>; even lift them up<S>5375</S>, ye everlasting<S>5769</S> doors<S>6607</S>; and the King<S>4428</S> of glory<S>3519</S> shall come in<S>935</S>.
Who is this King<S>4428</S> of glory<S>3519</S>? The LORD<S>3068</S> of hosts<S>6635</S>, he is the King<S>4428</S> of glory<S>3519</S>. Selah<S>5542</S>.
